title: I need help
body: I've had my mind set on buying Lucian and now I've seen Gosu play Ezreal he seems really strong, however I have played Ezreal and I am pretty bad at him. I need help to decide. :/

replies.body:
I Like Luc (Even tho ill be getting pulse fire ezreal later this year)

I hate to be inconclusive, but it's whoever you like more. Im way better at Lucian then i am at Ezreal but that isn't stoping me from getting pulse fire.

I Used to be terrible at zed, getting scores like 1/23/9. Now I'm playing games going 25/5/4 (may be overexerting a bit but you get the point). If you are bad at someone now, that doesn't mean you will bad at him in a few months 

(Hoped this helped)

-GL HF
Well playing a champion you find difficult will take you longer to learn but you'll probably get more out of it. And in the time you're spending practicing Ez you can farm up the IP to buy Lucian ;)

But I am 325 IP Away from Lucian D:
I am buying Lucian tho... then probs Cait then Ezreal
Hey Lucian is fun I'm sure it'll be great :)
Just avoid anything Gosu plays, as he sucks.
I agree with this statement. My AP Vayne is miles better than what that nerd plays.
